name: Landborne
description:
A fangame for the MFGG Fangame Jam.

Cheep-Cheeps are common ocean-dwellers within the Mushroom Kingdom. But how do they behave when you take away the ocean? This game is a culmination of years of research and constitutes my doctoral thesis on the subject.

Featuring several things I spent too much time on and several other things I spent too little on. Like an adaptive soundtrack and actually having levels, respectively.
